mapper.select: SELECT * FROM banner ORDER BY priority ASC, created DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO banner (image, title, content, link, active, priority) VALUES (#{image}, #{title}, #{content}, #{link}, #{active}, #{priority});
mapper.update: UPDATE banner SET image = #{image}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, link = #{link}, active = #{active}, priority = #{priority} WHERE banner_id = #{bannerId};
